home.hero.title: Apps that feel like they were made for you.
home.hero.sub: Six iOS apps. Each solves one problem. No accounts, no tracking, no complexity. Open the app, get the value, move on.
home.apps.label: Apps
home.apps.title: One app per problem. Nothing extra.
home.apps.sub: Every app is built the same way: privacy-first, offline-capable, and focused on a single outcome.
home.apps.fastrum: Stop overthinking fasting. Tap to start, tap to stop.
home.apps.somniq: Wake up knowing why you feel the way you do.
home.apps.stepiq: Have I walked enough today? Yes or no.
home.apps.matchup: The party game you explain in 10 seconds.
home.apps.nopaniq: You're having a panic attack. This app walks you through it.
home.apps.beginr: You don't need motivation. You need 5 minutes.
home.values.label: How we build
home.values.title: Every app follows the same rules.
home.values.privacy.label: Privacy
home.values.privacy.title: Your data stays on your device.
home.values.privacy.desc: No servers. No accounts. No analytics. Every app works offline after install.
home.values.focus.label: Focus
home.values.focus.title: One app, one job.
home.values.focus.desc: We don't bundle features. Each app solves a single problem and does it well.
home.values.simple.label: Simplicity
home.values.simple.title: No learning curve.
home.values.simple.desc: If the app needs a tutorial, the app is wrong. Open it and it makes sense.
home.values.honest.label: Honest pricing
home.values.honest.title: Free works. Pro adds more.
home.values.honest.desc: The free tier is fully functional. Pro unlocks extras. No paywalls on core features.
home.cta.title: Find the app you need.
home.cta.sub: Each one is free to download. No account required.
fastrum.hero.title: Stop overthinking fasting.
fastrum.hero.sub: Tap to start. Tap to stop. See where you are. That's it.
fastrum.hero.bullet1: Know exactly when fat burn and ketosis kick in
fastrum.hero.bullet2: See every past fast at a glance
fastrum.hero.bullet3: Get reminded when it's time to eat or fast
fastrum.hero.bullet4: No meal logging, no calorie counting, no weigh-ins
fastrum.usecases.label: This is for you if...
fastrum.usecases.title: Sound familiar?
fastrum.usecases.1: You've tried fasting apps that wanted your weight, meals, and blood type before you could start a timer
fastrum.usecases.2: You just want a timer that shows your fasting zone
fastrum.usecases.3: You keep forgetting when you started your last fast
fastrum.usecases.4: You want to see if you're actually reaching ketosis
fastrum.usecases.5: You don't need a coach — you just need a clock
fastrum.outcomes.label: What you get
fastrum.outcomes.title: Features that actually matter.
fastrum.outcomes.timer.label: One-tap timer
fastrum.outcomes.timer.title: Start fasting without thinking about it
fastrum.outcomes.timer.desc: No setup, no protocol selection, no onboarding quiz. Open the app, tap one button, your fast has begun.
fastrum.outcomes.zones.label: Fasting zones
fastrum.outcomes.zones.title: Know when fat burn and ketosis actually begin
fastrum.outcomes.zones.desc: See exactly which metabolic zone you're in: fed, fat burn, ketosis, or autophagy. Every hour of fasting means something.
fastrum.outcomes.history.label: History
fastrum.outcomes.history.title: See every fast you've done at a glance
fastrum.outcomes.history.desc: A clean, simple list of all your fasts. Duration, zones reached, when you started and stopped. No charts you'll never read.
fastrum.outcomes.reminders.label: Reminders
fastrum.outcomes.reminders.title: Get nudged when it's time to eat or fast
fastrum.outcomes.reminders.desc: Optional, gentle notifications that help you stay on rhythm without needing to watch the clock.
fastrum.diff.label: Why fastrum is different
fastrum.diff.title: We left out everything you don't need.
fastrum.diff.meal.title: Not a meal planner
fastrum.diff.meal.desc: You already know what to eat. fastrum won't ask you to log breakfast, scan barcodes, or plan your macros. That's not its job.
fastrum.diff.calorie.title: Not a calorie counter
fastrum.diff.calorie.desc: Fasting is about when you eat, not what. fastrum has zero interest in your calories, carbs, or protein intake.
fastrum.diff.weight.title: Not a weight tracker
fastrum.diff.weight.desc: Your weight is your business. fastrum will never ask you to step on a scale or set a goal weight. It tracks fasts. Period.
fastrum.objections.label: Fair questions
fastrum.objections.title: You might be wondering.
fastrum.objections.timer.a: Actually, yes — plus fasting zones that show your metabolic state in real time, a history of every fast you've done, and smart reminders. It's a timer that understands fasting.
fastrum.objections.meals.q: "Do I need to enter my meals?"
fastrum.objections.meals.a: No. Never. fastrum doesn't have a food database, a barcode scanner, or a meal log. You will never be asked what you ate.
fastrum.objections.free.a: One fast per day with full functionality. Fasting zones, history, everything works. No artificial limits on what the timer can do. Pro unlocks unlimited fasts, insights, and reminders.
fastrum.pricing.label: Pricing
fastrum.pricing.title: Simple and honest.
fastrum.cta.title: Ready to start?
fastrum.cta.sub: Download fastrum. Start your first fast in 10 seconds.
somniq.hero.title: Wake up knowing why you feel the way you do.
somniq.hero.sub: A 30-second morning check-in that shows you what's actually affecting your sleep.
somniq.hero.bullet2: See patterns in days, not months
somniq.hero.bullet3: Understand what helps and what hurts
somniq.foryou.label: This is for you if...
somniq.foryou.title: Sound familiar?
somniq.foryou.item1: You wake up tired and don't know why
somniq.foryou.item2: You don't want to wear a watch to bed
somniq.foryou.item3: You've tried sleep apps that gave you data but no insight
somniq.foryou.item4: You want to know if caffeine, screens, or stress are affecting your sleep
somniq.foryou.item5: You want a simple habit, not a science project
somniq.features.label: Features
somniq.features.title: What you get and why it matters.
somniq.features.card1.label: Morning check-in
somniq.features.card1.title: Log how you slept in 30 seconds
somniq.features.card1.desc: Rate your quality, duration, and how you feel. Quick enough to do before your feet hit the floor.
somniq.features.card2.label: Pattern detection
somniq.features.card2.title: See what actually makes you sleep better
somniq.features.card2.desc: somniq finds the connections between your habits and your sleep quality automatically.
somniq.features.card3.label: Trend view
somniq.features.card3.title: Watch your sleep quality change over weeks
somniq.features.card3.desc: A clear timeline of how your sleep evolves. Spot improvements or regressions at a glance.
somniq.features.card4.label: Correlation insights (Pro)
somniq.features.card4.title: Know exactly what helps and what hurts
somniq.features.card4.desc: Caffeine after 3pm? Late screens? Exercise timing? See the real impact on your sleep.
somniq.different.label: Why somniq
somniq.different.title: Built differently on purpose.
somniq.different.item1.title: No wearable required
somniq.different.item1.desc: Your own perception of sleep quality is surprisingly accurate. somniq uses that insight instead of making you buy hardware.
somniq.different.item2.title: Patterns, not just data
somniq.different.item2.desc: Most apps show you charts. somniq tells you what those charts mean and what to do about it.
somniq.different.item3.title: 30 seconds, not 5 minutes
somniq.different.item3.desc: The check-in is fast enough to become a habit. If it took longer, you'd stop doing it.
somniq.faq.label: Common questions
somniq.faq.title: You might be wondering.
somniq.faq.q1: Can I really track sleep without a wearable?
somniq.faq.a1: Yes. Research shows that self-reported sleep quality correlates strongly with objective sleep measurements. Your own perception is more useful than most people think.
somniq.faq.q2: How long until I see patterns?
somniq.faq.a2: Most users see meaningful patterns within 2 weeks of consistent check-ins. The more data somniq has, the clearer the picture becomes.
somniq.faq.a3: Full daily logging and basic trends are free forever. Pro adds correlation insights, detailed pattern analysis, and data export.
somniq.pricing.label: Pricing
somniq.pricing.title: Start free. Upgrade when it clicks.
somniq.cta.label: Ready?
somniq.cta.title: Start understanding your sleep.
somniq.cta.sub: Download somniq. Your first check-in takes 30 seconds.
somniq.cta.note: iOS 17+ · Free with optional Pro · No account required
hero.title: Have I walked enough today?
hero.sub: One glance. One answer. No graphs, no badges, no leaderboards.
audience.label: This is for you if...
audience.title: Step counters got complicated. Walking didn't.
audience.case1: You check your steps but don't know what the number means
audience.case2: You want a clear yes or no, not a dashboard
audience.case3: You've turned off step notifications because they were annoying
audience.case4: You just want to walk more without making it complicated
audience.case5: You're tired of apps that gamify your health
features.label: Features
features.title: Every feature earns its place.
features.f1.label: Smart goal
features.f1.title: Know instantly if you've walked enough
features.f1.desc: Set a daily step target. stepiq compares your current count and gives you a clear answer -- not a percentage, not a ring.
features.f2.label: HealthKit sync
features.f2.title: Uses data already on your phone
features.f2.desc: No extra hardware, no wearable required. stepiq reads from Apple Health -- the same data your iPhone collects automatically.
features.f3.label: Weekly view
features.f3.title: See your week at a glance
features.f3.desc: Seven days. Did you hit your goal or not? A simple row of yes-or-no indicators. No complex trend analysis needed.
features.f4.label: Widgets (Pro)
features.f4.title: Check your steps without opening the app
features.f4.desc: A home screen widget that shows today's count and whether you've hit your goal. One glance, zero taps.
different.label: Why different
different.title: Less is the entire point.
different.d1.title: No gamification
different.d1.desc: No streaks, no badges, no achievements. Walking is not a game. You don't need a reward for moving your body.
different.d2.title: No social features
different.d2.desc: No leaderboards, no sharing, no friends list. Your step count is between you and your shoes.
different.d3.title: No complexity
different.d3.desc: No heart rate zones, no calorie burn estimates, no 47-metric dashboard. One question. One answer.
objections.label: Common questions
objections.title: Fair questions, honest answers.
objections.a1: Yes, but does it tell you if that's enough? Your phone shows a number. stepiq shows a decision: you've walked enough, or you haven't. That's the difference between data and an answer.
objections.a2: Start with 8,000 steps. That's what most research points to for general health. Walk for a week, see how it feels, and adjust. There's no magic number -- just the one that works for your life.
objections.a3: Yes. Free gives you full daily step tracking with a basic goal. Pro adds weekly trends, home screen widgets, and custom goals. The free tier is genuinely useful, not a teaser.
pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.title: Free to start. Pro when you're ready.
cta.title: Start walking with clarity.
cta.sub: Download stepiq. Know if you've moved enough -- in one glance.
cta.note: iOS 17+ · Free with optional Pro · No account required
matchup.hero.title: The party game you explain in 10 seconds.
matchup.hero.sub: Pick a category. Split into teams. Start playing. No cards, no boards, no setup.
matchup.scenarios.label: This is for you if...
matchup.scenarios.title: Sound familiar?
matchup.scenarios.item1: You're at a party and someone says "we should play a game"
matchup.scenarios.item2: You're tired of explaining rules for 10 minutes
matchup.scenarios.item3: You want something that works without WiFi at a cabin
matchup.scenarios.item4: You need a game that works for 4 people or 20
matchup.scenarios.item5: You left your board games at home
matchup.features.label: What you get
matchup.features.title: Feature meets outcome
matchup.features.f1.label: Instant start
matchup.features.f1.desc: Playing within 30 seconds of opening the app
matchup.features.f2.label: Built-in categories
matchup.features.f2.desc: Sports, movies, music, geography, and more
matchup.features.f3.label: Team scoring
matchup.features.f4.label: Custom games (Pro)
matchup.features.f4.desc: Create your own categories for inside jokes
matchup.diff.label: Why different
matchup.diff.title: Three things you never have to deal with
matchup.diff.d1.title: No setup
matchup.diff.d1.desc: Open the app, pick a category, play. No tokens, no spinner, no board to unfold. Your phone is the entire game.
matchup.diff.d2.title: No internet
matchup.diff.d2.desc: Everything runs on-device. Works at a cabin, on a plane, or anywhere your group happens to be.
matchup.diff.d3.title: No explaining
matchup.diff.d3.desc: One person describes, team guesses. That is the entire rulebook. Everyone gets it immediately.
matchup.objections.label: Common questions
matchup.objections.title: Before you ask
matchup.objections.a1: Yes. Works great with 4+ people. Two teams of two is plenty for a competitive, fast-paced game.
matchup.objections.a2: No. One phone, pass it around. The app handles turn switching and scoring for you.
matchup.objections.a3: Full game experience with core categories. Pro unlocks all categories, custom games, and stats.
matchup.pricing.label: Pricing
matchup.pricing.title: Play free. Go Pro for more.
matchup.cta.title: Game night starts now.
matchup.cta.sub: Download matchup. You'll be playing before you finish reading this.
matchup.cta.note: iOS 17+ · No account required · Works offline
nopaniq.hero.title: You're having a panic attack. This app walks you through it.
nopaniq.hero.sub: Open the app. Follow the steps. It passes. No login, no setup, no thinking required.
nopaniq.hero.bullet3: Designed for the moment you can't think clearly
nopaniq.foryou.label: Is this for me?
nopaniq.foryou.title: This is for you if...
nopaniq.foryou.case1: You've had a panic attack and didn't know what to do
nopaniq.foryou.case2: You know breathing helps but can't remember the technique when it matters
nopaniq.foryou.case3: You want something on your wrist for when you can't reach your phone
nopaniq.foryou.case4: You've tried meditation apps but they don't help during actual panic
nopaniq.foryou.case5: You want to feel less alone in the moment
nopaniq.foryou.case6: You need something that works immediately, not after 10 minutes of setup
nopaniq.features.label: What it does
nopaniq.features.title: Each step has a purpose.
nopaniq.features.sub: The app guides you through clinically validated techniques, one at a time, so you don't have to remember anything.
nopaniq.features.guide.label: Step-by-step guide
nopaniq.features.guide.title: Follow along without having to think
nopaniq.features.guide.desc: Safety anchor, breathing, grounding, reassurance. Each step appears only when you're ready for it.
nopaniq.features.breathing.label: Box breathing (4-4-4)
nopaniq.features.breathing.title: Slow your heart rate with guided breathing
nopaniq.features.breathing.desc: Inhale 4 seconds, hold 4 seconds, exhale 4 seconds. The app counts for you with haptic feedback.
nopaniq.features.grounding.label: 5-4-3-2-1 grounding
nopaniq.features.grounding.title: Come back to the present moment
nopaniq.features.grounding.desc: 5 things you see, 4 you hear, 3 you touch, 2 you smell, 1 you taste. Step by step until you're here again.
nopaniq.features.watch.label: Apple Watch
nopaniq.features.watch.title: Get help from your wrist when you can't reach your phone
nopaniq.features.watch.desc: A tap on your wrist starts the guided relief. Haptic breathing cues you can feel even with your eyes closed.
nopaniq.different.label: Why this is different
nopaniq.different.title: Built for panic, not for calm.
nopaniq.different.meditation.title: Not meditation
nopaniq.different.meditation.desc: This is for acute panic, not daily practice. You open it when something is wrong, not as part of a morning routine.
nopaniq.different.therapy.title: Not therapy
nopaniq.different.therapy.desc: This is a tool, not a replacement for professional help. If you experience frequent panic attacks, please see a professional.
nopaniq.different.simple.title: Not complicated
nopaniq.different.simple.desc: No accounts, no journals, no tracking required. Open the app. It does its job. That's it.
nopaniq.objections.label: Common questions
nopaniq.objections.title: Honest answers.
nopaniq.objections.q1: Can an app really help during a panic attack?
nopaniq.objections.a1: Yes. Guided breathing and grounding are clinically validated techniques. The app just makes them accessible when you can't think straight.
nopaniq.objections.q2: What if I can't even look at my phone?
nopaniq.objections.a2: That's why we built Apple Watch support. A tap on your wrist starts the guide. Haptic breathing cues work even with your eyes closed.
nopaniq.objections.q3: Is this a replacement for therapy?
nopaniq.objections.a3: No. This is a tool for the moment. If you experience frequent panic attacks, please seek professional help. nopaniq is there for when you need immediate support.
nopaniq.pricing.label: Pricing
nopaniq.pricing.title: Relief shouldn't have a paywall.
nopaniq.pricing.sub: The core guided relief is completely free. Pro unlocks personal tools for people who want more.
nopaniq.cta.title: Be ready for the next one.
nopaniq.cta.sub: Download nopaniq. It's there when you need it.
beginr.hero.title:
You don't need motivation.
You need 5 minutes.
beginr.hero.sub: One button. One timer. Five minutes. The hardest part is starting — beginr removes everything else.
beginr.foryou.label: This is for you if
beginr.foryou.title: You already know you should start.
beginr.foryou.case1: You spend more time setting up your productivity system than being productive
beginr.foryou.case2: You know you should start but keep postponing
beginr.foryou.case3: You've tried Pomodoro apps and got lost in the settings
beginr.foryou.case4: You want to build a daily habit without tracking streaks
beginr.foryou.case5: You believe that starting is the hardest part
beginr.features.label: What you get
beginr.features.title: Every feature removes an excuse.
beginr.features.f1.label: One button
beginr.features.f1.title: Remove every excuse between you and starting
beginr.features.f1.desc: No setup, no configuration, no choices. Open the app, press start. That's the entire interaction.
beginr.features.f2.label: 5-minute sessions
beginr.features.f2.title: Short enough to never skip, long enough to matter
beginr.features.f2.desc: Five minutes is the threshold where resistance collapses. Most people keep going once they start.
beginr.features.f3.label: Session history PRO
beginr.features.f3.title: See proof that you showed up
beginr.features.f3.desc: A simple record of how many sessions you completed and when. No charts, no trends. Just evidence.
beginr.features.f4.label: Daily reminders PRO
beginr.features.f4.title: Get nudged at the right moment
beginr.features.f4.desc: A gentle reminder to start. Not a guilt trip. You choose the time. Disable anytime.
beginr.different.label: Why different
beginr.different.title: Everything we removed is the feature.
beginr.different.d1.title: No settings
beginr.different.d1.desc: Nothing to configure means nothing to procrastinate on. The timer is 5 minutes. Always.
beginr.different.d2.title: No streaks
beginr.different.d2.desc: Miss a day? No guilt. No broken streak. No lost progress. Just open the app and start again.
beginr.different.d3.title: No complexity
beginr.different.d3.desc: One screen, one button, one outcome. You started. That is the entire point.
beginr.objections.label: Fair questions
beginr.objections.title: You might be wondering.
beginr.objections.a1: It's not about the 5 minutes. It's about starting. Most people keep going once they begin. The timer is just a trick to get past the resistance.
beginr.objections.a2: Because choosing is procrastinating. Should it be 15 minutes? 25? 45? You just spent 10 minutes deciding. With beginr, there's nothing to decide. 5 minutes works.
beginr.objections.a3: One session per day, full experience. The core of beginr is free. Pro adds unlimited sessions, session history, daily reminders, and themes.
beginr.pricing.label: Pricing
beginr.pricing.title: Start for free. Upgrade if you want more.
beginr.cta.title: Stop planning. Start.
beginr.cta.sub: Download beginr. Your first session is 5 minutes away.
beginr.cta.note: iOS 17+ · Free with optional Pro · No account required
